protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24223
protocol.text: For expression profiling experiments 25mg (per flask) of Arabidopsis thaliana ecotype Columbia seeds were surface sterilised with 70% ethanol and 5% calciumhypochloride for 45 minutes,  then cold treated for 3 days at 4º celsius.  They were grown for exactly 6 days in media containing 1% sucrose and 1/2 strength MS and pH adjusted to 5.7 using 1M KOH, on a shaker at 180 rpm under continuous fluorescent light (75µmol m-2s-1).

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24224
protocol.text: At the start of treatment, media in the flasks was exchanged either against fresh media containing 600nM Isoxaben or fresh media without isoxaben. Samples (consisting of the content of one flask) were harvested from treated and untreated material at the following timepoints: 0h, 4h, 8h, 12h, 18h, 20h, 24h, 36h Upon harvest, plant material was washed with dd H2O, dried and frozen in liquid nitrogen.  Samples were stored at -80 degrees celsius until further processing.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-24225
protocol.text: For isolation of total RNA samples were ground to fine powder in liquid nitrogen. Subsequently total RNA was isolated using the Qiagen RNeasy kit by following the kits instructions.
